#GlobalMenuNotification

= Introduction =

GlobalMenuNotification is the subset of XClientMessage we used for global menu embedding protocal.

  * .window = XWindow ID of recipient
  * .type = ClientMessage
  * .message_type = gdk_x11_get_xatom_by_name("_GTK_MENU_BAR_EMBED")
  * .format = 32;
  * .data.l[0] = gtk_get_current_event_time()
  * .data.l[1] = Message Sub-Type (GlobalMenuNotificationXXX)
  * .data.l[2] = param1
  * .data.l[3] = param2
  * .data.l[4] = param3
